description: This file contains C source code implementing helper functions for processing msgpack-encoded data, including parsing arrays within msgpack objects and associated utility functions.

methods.name: void * helper_convert_array(const void * buf,size_t len,size_t struct_size,bool optional,process_fn_t process,destroy_fn_t destroy)
methods.description: Converts a buffer to an array structure, unpacking msgpack data and processing array elements.

methods.name: msgpack_object * __finderarray(const char * name,msgpack_object_type expect_type,msgpack_object_map * map)
methods.description: Finds a specific array within a msgpack map based on name and expected type.

ctags.name: helper_convert_array
ctags.signature: (const void * buf,size_t len,size_t struct_size,bool optional,process_fn_t process,destroy_fn_t destroy)
